title: ExaminU
description: Dynamic quiz application supporting multiple subjects. Designed with Next.js and utilizes the Nodejs fs module to dynamically fetch questions from an API, ensuring scalable content management.

title: Tic Tac Toe
description: A responsive, 2-player web-based game built with NextJs showcasing stateful game logic with React Hooks, clean UI/UX, and live deployment, demonstrating core component development skills.

title: Fast Logistics Agent
description: A simple, clean, and fully responsive promotional landing page developed and deployed for a logistics company, focusing on quick performance and mobile-first design.
